title: ID/ME Colab Des Studio 1
description: An interdisciplinary team-based approach to integrate industrial design and engineering competencies in user-centered design development of products and systems with emphasis on corporate-sponsored projects.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ID 3032 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ID 3042 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ID 3052 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
